\begin{tikzpicture}[]
  \begin{axis}[
      width=\textwidth,
      height=1.5\textwidth,
      xlabel={Time (\si{\pico\second})},
      ylabel={IPR},
      minor x tick num={4},
      minor y tick num={4},
      enlargelimits = 0.1
  ]
    \addplot[smooth, thick, no marks] table[x = {time}, y={ipr}] {ipr.dat};
    \draw[dashed, opacity=0.2] (axis cs:12,-1) -- (axis cs:12,1) {};
  \end{axis}
\end{tikzpicture}
